title: 245. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 pkg. crescent rolls
1/4 c. sour cream
1/4 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. Ranch dressing mix (Hidden Valley)
8 oz. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. grated Mozzarella cheese
1 pkg. grated Cheddar cheese or American
1/2 to 3/4 c. grated carrots (raw)
1/2 to 3/4 c. broccoli, finely chopped (raw)
1/2 to 3/4 c. cauliflower, finely chopped (raw)

preparation

Spray a large sheet pan with Pam. Place crescent rolls whole on sheet pan. Form a crust. Press the seams together to close any cracks. Bake at 350° until lightly brown; let cool. Mix together sour cream, mayonnaise, Ranch dressing mix and cream cheese and spread over the crust. Sprinkle over spread the remaining ingredients. Chill in the refrigerator for several hours before cutting into serving pieces.

title: 211. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1 jar pizza sauce
1 pkg. sliced pepperoni
8 oz. pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 (16 oz.) box corkscrew macaroni

preparation

Fry the ground chuck until brown. Add cooked macaroni, pizza sauce and ground chuck together in a large flat casserole dish. Spread Mozzarella cheese over top. Place sliced pepperoni on top of cheese. Bake in oven at 325° for 25 minutes.

title: 250. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. sugar cookie dough
8 oz. cream cheese
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1 pkg. strawberry glaze
grapes
strawberries
bananas
kiwi
pineapple (fresh)
peaches (fresh)

preparation

Spread cookie dough in a 9 x 13-inch pan and bake according to directions on package. Then set aside to cool. Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla. Spread mixture over cooled cookie crust. Next, spread strawberry glaze over the cream cheese mixture. Slice fruit separately and arrange in layers over strawberry glaze. Refrigerate 1 hour before serving.

title: 27. VEGGIE PIZZA APPETIZERS
info:
VEGGIE PIZZA APPETIZERS

ingredients

2 cans (8 count) Crescent Rolls
16 oz. Soft Cream Cheese
1 envelope Hidden Valley Ranch Salad Dressing Mix
1 cup Mayonnaise
Broccoli
Red Pepper
Cucumber
Baby Carrots

preparation

Spray a 15 inch jelly roll pan with non-stick cooking spray, pull out the dough sealing the edges. Bake according to pkg directions, leave in the pan to cool.

Chop all the veggies very small and toss them together in a large bowl. Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and Salad dressing mix together, spread over the cooled crust. Top with veggies, pressing down into the cream cheese. Cut into 1 inch squares.

You can replace the above veggies with what ever kind of veggies you like.

title: 99. MACARONI PIZZA STYLE
info:
MACARONI PIZZA STYLE

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
8 oz. small elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
1 (15 oz.) Hunt's tomato sauce with tomato bits
1/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. oregano
2 c. mozzarella cheese

preparation

Brown beef and onion. Mix seasonings in water. Mix browned beef, cooked macaroni, seasonings and tomato sauce. Pour 1/2 mixture in Pyrex dish; add 1/2 of cheese. Pour remaining meat mixture and top with cheese. Makes two 8 x 8 or one 8 x 12 inch pyrex dishes. Freezes well for another meal.

title: 196. QUICK PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
QUICK PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 (14 oz.) jar pizza sauce
2 c. (8 oz.) Mozzarella cheese
3/4 c. biscuit mix
1 1/2 c. milk
2 eggs

preparation

Brown ground beef and drain. Spoon into 8-inch baking dish. Top with pizza sauce and cheese. Combine biscuit mix, milk and eggs. Beat until smooth and pour over casserole. Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes.

title: 16. PEPPERONI HEART SHAPED PIZZA
info:
PEPPERONI HEART SHAPED PIZZA

ingredients

2 c. Bisquick baking mix
1/2 c. cold water
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves, slightly crushed
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
8 oz. tomato sauce
3 1/2 oz. pkg. pepperoni
1 (2.2 oz.) can sliced olives
1 (2 1/2 oz.) jar sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (6 oz.)

preparation

Heat oven to 425°. Mix baking mix and water until soft dough forms; beat vigorously for 20 strokes. Pat dough with hands floured with baking mix into 12-inch heart shape on lightly greased cookie sheet, carefully forming a 1/2-inch rim. Sprinkle evenly with Parmesan cheese. Stir oregano and garlic powder into tomato sauce; spoon over Parmesan cheese. Carefully spread to cover; sprinkle with remaining ingredients. Bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes.

title: 22. PIZZA CUPS
info:
PIZZA CUPS

ingredients

2 Tbsp. margarine
1/3 c. mushrooms, chopped
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
1/4 c. onion, chopped
6 oz. tomato paste
1/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
7 1/2 oz. can refrigerated buttermilk biscuits

preparation

Melt margarine. Add mushrooms, peppers and onions to skillet. Stir until veggies are tender. Add tomato paste, water and oregano; blend. Cover for 5 minutes. Simmer over low heat. Add 1 cup cheese. Mix well. Grease 10 muffin cups. Separate dough into 10 biscuits. Press biscuits onto bottom and sides of muffin cups. Fill with vegetable mixture. Bake at 375° for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with remaining cheese.

title: 176. PEPPERONI PIZZA SPREAD
info:
PEPPERONI PIZZA SPREAD

ingredients

2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 c. real mayonnaise
1 c. chopped pepperoni
1 (4 oz.) can drained mushrooms, drained and chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. green pepper
1 (6 oz.) can ripe olives
1 c. chopped stuffed green olives
crackers, breadsticks and/or French bread

preparation

In large bowl, combine the first 9 ingredients. Transfer to an 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with crackers, breadsticks or French bread.

title: 41. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 pkg. Pillsbury crescent rolls
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 to 2 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix
1 pkg. finely shredded mild cheddar cheese
1 pkg. finely shredded Monterey Jack and colby cheese
raw vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, carrots, radishes), cut up fine
small amount of mayonnaise to spread

preparation

Place unrolled crescents on large cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 11 to 13 minutes. Cool completely. Mix cream cheese, dressing and mayonnaise to make a creamy spread. Spread on rolls. Crumble veggies over cream cheese mixture. Top with shredded cheese. Serve.

title: 120. PIZZA BREAD
info:
PIZZA BREAD

ingredients

1/2 lb. bacon
24 (3 cans) buttermilk biscuits (refrigerated)
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter, melted
8 oz. (1 pkg.) pepperoni (cooked to get excess grease out)
16 oz. cheese, Cheddar OR mozzarella
1 small onion, diced fine
1 small green pepper, diced fine

preparation

Cook bacon then crumble into pieces and set aside.

Cut biscuits into quarters. Dip each piece into melted butter and layer 1/3 of the pieces into a greased bundt pan. Sprinkle half of each of the following ingredients over biscuits in the bundt pan: bacon, pepperoni, onion, cheese and green pepper.

Put another 1/3 of the prepared biscuits on top of the ingredients in the pan. Cover with the rest of the bacon, pepperoni, onion, cheese and green pepper.

Put the last 1/3 of the prepared biscuits on top of the ingredients in the pan.

Bake at 350° for 40 minutes or until golden brown.

title: 69. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. crescent rolls
1 lb. sausage
1 small pkg. hash browns, thawed
1 c. shredded cheese
5 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 tsp. pepper

preparation

Roll out crescent rolls onto pizza pan. Brown and drain sausage. Add on top of crust, then thawed hash browns. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour over sausage. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 350° until browned, approximately 20 to 30 minutes.

title: 216. SPAGHETTI PIZZA
info:
SPAGHETTI PIZZA

ingredients

2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 (16 oz.) pkg. spaghetti, cooked and drained
1 lb. ground beef, cooked and drained
1 (28 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. sliced pepperoni (optional)
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom pieces, drained
1/4 c. chopped onion
garlic salt to taste
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese

preparation

In a large bowl, beat the eggs and milk. Add spaghetti. Toss to coat. Transfer to a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Top with beef, spaghetti sauce, pepperoni, mushrooms and onion. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Let stand 15 minutes before cutting. Yield: 8 servings.

title: 243. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

1 can crescent rolls
1 head cauliflower
sliced olives
2 to 3 tsp. mayonnaise
1 pkg. Ranch dressing mix
1 bunch broccoli
1 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. sour cream
1 pkg. cream cheese

preparation

Line cookie sheet with rolls, making an edge like a pizza. Make sure to spray pan. Bake 8 to 10 minutes. Set aside to cool. Mix cream cheese, sour cream and mayonnaise with Ranch dressing until soft enough to spread. Spread cream cheese mixture into cooled crust. Layer vegetables on top with grated cheese and olives.

title: 112. PIZZA POTATOES
info:
PIZZA POTATOES

ingredients

1 pkg. scalloped potatoes
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes or pizza sauce
1 1/2 c. water
1 (6 oz.) pkg. sliced pepperoni
1 pkg. Mozzarella cheese, shredded

preparation

Empty potato slices and packet of seasoned sauce mix into ungreased 2 quart casserole dish. Heat tomatoes, and water to boiling, stir into potatoes. Arrange pepperoni on top and sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes uncovered.

title: 251. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 box yellow cake mix
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. soft butter
2 eggs
1/2 c. chopped nuts

preparation

Mix ingredients and spread into 2 greased pizza pans. Bake at 350° for 15-20 minutes.

Filling:

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1/2 c. powdered sugar

preparation

Whip together. Spread over crust. Arrange fruits of your choice (ex. strawberries, kiwi, oranges and pineapples).

Topping:

ingredients

1/4 c. sugar
1 c. pineapple juice
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch

preparation

Combine ingredients. Cook until thick; stirring constantly. Let cool. Pour over fruit. Chill before serving.

title: 219. PIZZA
info:
PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

2 c. biscuit mix
2 Tbsp. French's mustard
1/2 c. milk

preparation

Measure mix into a bowl. Stir mustard into milk and blend into mix. Knead 1 minutes on board dusted with biscuit mix. Roll to fit 12 inch pizza pan. Prick surface with a fork. Bake in hot oven, 425°, for 5-7 minutes or until set. Remove from oven. Reduce heat to 375°.

Filling:

ingredients

2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. French's minced onion
2 Tbsp. French's mustard
1/4 tsp. French's oregano
1 lb. sausage, well cooked and drained
1 c. grated sharp cheddar cheese
2 Tbsp. grated parmesan cheese

preparation

Combine tomato sauce, sugar, onion, mustard and oregano. Bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes. Pour into partially baked crust. Sprinkle with half of cheddar, then sausage, then remaining cheddar. Top with parmesan. Return to oven. Bake 12-15 minutes or until cheese melts and crust is deep golden brown. Yield: 6 servings.

Friendly warning: Because French's mustard has a special flavor, texture and color all its own, don't expect best results from this recipe with any other mustard.

title: 83. SAUSAGE AND PEPPERONI PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
SAUSAGE AND PEPPERONI PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. Bob Evans Italian roll sausage
1 (12 oz.) pkg. wide noodles, cooked
2 (14 oz.) jars pizza sauce
2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 (6 oz.) pkg. pepperoni slices

preparation

Preheat oven to 350°. Crumble sausage into medium skillet. Cook over medium heat until brown, stirring occasionally. Remove sausage and drain on paper towels. In a large, lightly greased casserole dish, layer 1/2 of cooked noodles, 1/2 of sausage and 1/2 of remaining ingredients. Repeat with second layer of noodles and sausage. Layer remaining cheese and pepperoni, reserving several pieces of pepperoni slices to garnish top. Bake 35 to 40 minutes. Refrigerate leftovers.

title: 61. PIZZA CUPS
info:
PIZZA CUPS

ingredients

3/4 lb ground beef
6 oz tomato paste
1 tbsp minced onion
1 tsp Italian seasoning
1/2 tsp salt
10 oz can refrigerated biscuits
1/2 c mozzarella cheese

preparation

Brown and drain beef. Stir in tomato paste, onion, and seasoning (mixture will be thick). Cook over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Place biscuits in a greased muffin pan, pressing down to cover the bottom and sides. Spoon about 1/4 cup of meat mixture into biscuit lined cups. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 400° for 12 minutes or until golden brown.

Makes 12 cups.

title: 214. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. crescent rolls
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
8 oz. salad dressing
dill dip to taste
vegetables, cut up to desired size (any kind of vegetables you like)
shredded cheese

preparation

Pat out rolls to cover baking sheet. Bake to directions on package. Mix cream cheese, salad dressing and dill dip. Spread onto cool crescent rolls. Place vegetables on top of cream cheese mixture. Place shredded cheese on top.

title: 241. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. hamburger
small onion
jar Ragu pizza sauce
1/2 c. water
1 (10 count) can large biscuits
1 bag Mozzarella cheese
1 pkg. pepperoni

preparation

Brown hamburger and onion. Drain grease. Add Ragu sauce and water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Cut biscuits into 4 pieces each. Place in greased 9 x 13 baking dish. Pour sauce over this. Top with Mozzarella cheese and pepperoni. Bake 30 to 35 minutes at 350°.

title: 178. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 pkg. crescent dinner rolls
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (at room temperature)
1 c. green peppers, finely chopped
1 c. carrots, finely chopped
1 pkg. dry Ranch dressing mix
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. broccoli, finely chopped
1 c. cauliflower, finely chopped
8 oz. shredded cheese

preparation

Flatten dinner rolls out on cookie sheet. Put creases together. Bake according to directions until brown. Cool for 20 minutes.

Beat cream cheese, then add mayonnaise and dry Ranch dressing mix. Mix all together well. Spread this mixture over the top of the crust. Top with chopped veggies. Sprinkle with cheese on top. Cut in small finger-sized squares. Cover and keep in refrigerator until serving time. Makes enough to share.

Hint: Use low-fat ingredients for a lower fat count.

title: 17. PIZZA
info:
PIZZA

ingredients

1 (1 lb.) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
4 oz. sliced pepperoni
green pepper strips (eyebrows, nose, mouth)
olive slices (eyes)

preparation

Heat oven to 425°. Divide thawed dough in half; roll and stretch each half into 10 to 12-inch circle on round pizza pan. Turn up edges 1/2 inch and pinch. Brush circles with oil. Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese. Mix tomato sauce, onion, salt, oregano and garlic powder. Pour on circles. Top with Cheddar cheese. Decorate with overlapping pepperoni slices, green pepper strips and olive slices for face. Bake until crust is brown, 20 to 25 minutes. Makes 2 pizzas.

title: 181. PIZZA SOUP
info:
PIZZA SOUP

ingredients

2 lb. ground beef
1 green pepper, diced
1 red pepper, diced
1/2 lb. pepperoni, sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. dried oregano
1 piece cooked Italian sausage, sliced
1/2 c. fresh basil, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 medium onion, diced
2 (16 oz.) cans diced tomatoes with juice
1 qt. water
2 (16 oz.) cans pizza sauce
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
shredded Mozzarella (for garnish)

preparation

In a medium saucepot, add beef and all ingredients, except the pizza sauce, tomatoes and the water. Saut until the beef is done; add the pizza sauce, tomatoes and the water. Let simmer for 1/2 hour. Garnish with cheese.

title: 56. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. ground meat
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
2 eggs
3/4 c. biscuit mix
1 (14 oz.) jar pizza sauce
1 1/4 c. milk

preparation

Cook meat until brown, stirring as you go; drain well and pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan. Top with pizza sauce and cheese. Combine biscuit mix, milk and eggs. Beat until smooth and pour over the top evenly. Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes.

title: 220. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 jar pizza sauce
1 (8 oz.) spiral pasta, cooked and drained
2 c. mozzarella cheese
4 oz. pepperoni

preparation

Brown beef and cook onion until done and drain. Stir in pizza sauce and pasta. Transfer to 13 x 9 inch pan. Sprinkle with cheese and place pepperoni on top. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: 254. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

4x confectioners sugar
1 qt. fresh strawberries
strawberry glaze
crushed pineapple
3 bananas
8 oz. cream cheese
sugar cookie roll
Pam
lemon juice

preparation

Press sugar cookie roll on sheet (sprayed with Pam). Cook at 350° for 15 minutes and cool. Combine 1 1/2 cups confectioners sugar with 8 ounces cream cheese; mix and spread on cooled cookie.

Slice 3 bananas (coat with 2 tablespoons lemon juice). Stir until coated good. Put on cream cheese mixture. Slice strawberries, then glaze. Drain pineapple and top. Fix day before and refrigerate.

title: 169. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 roll of sugar cookie dough
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. sugar
1 pkg. strawberry glaze
assorted fresh fruits (sliced) or fruit cocktail

preparation

Thaw cookie dough and press out with floured fingers on cookie sheet or pizza pan. Bake at 350 degrees until golden brown. Cool. Mix sugar with softened cream cheese. Spread mixture to edges of cookie pizza. Drizzle with thin layer of strawberry glaze. Add fruit and chill for 30 minutes.

title: 143. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

Pillsbury cookie dough (in tube)
8 oz. Philadelphia cream cheese
cup powdered sugar
1/4 tsp. vanilla
pineapple tidbits (drained)
mandarin oranges (drained)
kiwi
coconut
strawberries

preparation

Crust: Spread cookie dough on a round pizza pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes or until golden brown. Let cool.

Icing: Mix together in a bowl, cream cheese, powdered sugar and vanilla. Spread evenly on cooled cookie crust.

Cut strawberries and kiwi, put on top of icing. Also top with drained pineapple tidbits, mandarin oranges, and sprinkle with coconut.

title: 242. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

2 cans crescent rolls
8 oz. cream cheese
8 oz. sour cream
8 oz. shredded cheese

preparation

Spread rolls on cookie sheet and bake until golden brown. cool Mix cream cheese and sour cream together. Spread on cool crust.

Vegetables:

ingredients

cauliflower
broccoli
cherry tomatoes
onions
carrots
peppers

preparation

Chop and dice the desired amount of vegetables and arrange on top. Add Shredded cheese top of vegetables. Do not bake.

title: 215. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef, fry and drain grease
1/3 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can tomato soup
1/2 can water
2 c. wide cooked noodles
1 c. Mozzarella cheese

preparation

Add the onions, oregano, salt, soup and water to meat. Layer the noodles, meat mixture and cheese. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

title: 38. QUICK SNACK TIME PIZZA
info:
QUICK SNACK TIME PIZZA

ingredients

1 can biscuits
pizza sauce
pepperoni
sausage, cooked and drained
shredded mozzarella cheese

preparation

Heat oven to 350 degrees. Remove biscuits from can and flatten. Place onto, (vegetable sprayed), cookie sheet. Top each biscuit with 1 tablespoon pizza sauce. Place pepperoni and sausage on top of sauce. Top each with cheese. Bake 8--10 minutes or until biscuits are done and cheese melted.

title: 113. PIZZA POTATOES CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA POTATOES CASSEROLE

ingredients

5 oz. (1 box) scalloped potatoes
16 oz. (1 can) tomatoes, whole
1 1/2 c. water
1/4 tsp. oregano
8 oz. (1 pkg.) pepperoni, sliced
4 oz. (1 pkg.) mozzarella cheese, shredded

preparation

Empty potato slices (and seasoned sauce packet) into an ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Heat tomatoes, water and oregano to a boil. Stir into potatoes. Arrange pepperoni on top and sprinkle with cheese.

Bake uncovered at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes.

title: 162. PIZZA GRILLED CHEESE
info:
PIZZA GRILLED CHEESE

ingredients

1 Tbsp. butter, softened
2 slices bread
1 slice cheese
2 Tbsp. pizza sauce
6 slices pepperoni (optional)

preparation

Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place one slice in a skillet, butter side down. Top with cheese, pepperoni, sauce and second slice of bread, butter side up. Cook over medium heat until golden brown, turning once.

title: 238. PIZZA-BURGERS
info:
PIZZA-BURGERS

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 can pizza sauce
1 pkg. Mozzarella cheese, sliced

preparation

Brown meat and drain. Add pizza sauce. Patty out burgers and grill. When done, top with Mozzarella cheese and melt. Serve on hamburger with toppings of choice.

title: 204. PIZZA POCKETS
info:
PIZZA POCKETS

ingredients

1 tube crescent rolls
1 jar pizza sauce
1 pkg. sliced pepperoni
1 c. shredded mozzarella cheese

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Unroll crescent rolls. do not separate into triangles. Take each rectangle piece of dough and roll slightly between 2 pieces of waxed paper. Put a teaspoon or two of pizza sauce in middle of rectangle. Top with pepperoni and cheese. Fold edges over and seal along cracks. Bake for 15 minutes. One tube makes 4 pizza pockets.

title: 154. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2/3 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. original Ranch dressing
2 cans crescent rolls
raw vegetables

preparation

Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and Ranch dressing; let stand several hours or overnight. Pinch together the crescent rolls on a pizza pan. Bake at 375° for 10 to 13 minutes. Let cool; spread cream cheese mixture on top.

Garnish with raw vegetables, olives, peppers, broccoli, etc. At Christmas use red bell pepper and broccoli.

title: 174. CHINESE VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
CHINESE VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 yellow squash
2 zucchini
1 green bell pepper
1 red bell pepper
1 large onion
8 cloves of garlic
5 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. black pepper
4 pieces flat bread, round 6 inch size
1/2 cup parmesan cheese
6-8 oz. sliced mozzarella cheese

preparation

Wash all veggies. Cut squash, zucchini, and peppers into thin slices. Quarter garlic. Cut onion into thin stringy slices. Mix all veggies well, add 5 Tbsp. soy sauce, garlic and black pepper, mix again. Place veggies in lightly sprayed grilling basket. Cook on BBQ grill for 15 minutes or until veggies get tender. Heat oven to 375F. Place bread on baking sheet, place veggies on top of bread in equal amounts. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and dust with parmesan cheese. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until cheese has melted. Can be served with Jalapeno Soy Dip.

title: 247. PIZZA BREAD
info:
PIZZA BREAD

ingredients

3 loaves frozen bread (Bridgeford)
1 lb. Owens hot sausage
3 bunches green onions
2 pkg. sliced pepperoni
salad olives (small jar)
2 lb. grated Cheddar cheese
Tabasco

preparation

Put frozen loaves in refrigerator overnight. Cut each loaf in half and roll out. Brown sausage and drain. Chop green onions, olives and pepperoni. On each 1/2 loaf rolled out, layer sausage, onions, olives, pepperoni and cheese. Sprinkle a few drops of Tabasco, if desired. Roll up and seal edges. Bake at 350° for about 35 minutes or until brown. At this point, you may eat it or freeze it. If frozen, remove from freezer (do not thaw) and bake at 350° for about 25 minutes or until hot all the way through. Makes 6 loaves.

title: 279. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

2 cans crescent rolls
1 lb. sausage
4 eggs
1 c. grated cheese

preparation

Place rolls in pizza pan to form shape of pizza pan. Brown sausage and crumble sausage over crust. Beat eggs, salt and pepper. Pour over sausage. Put cheese over this. Bake at 350° until crust is brown and eggs are done.

title: 248. HOMEMADE PIZZA CRUST
info:
HOMEMADE PIZZA CRUST

ingredients

2 c. self-rising flour
3 Tbsp. oil
milk
salt
1 tsp. red chilli powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. plain yogurt
2 tsp. dry yeast

preparation

Mix all the ingredient and make a dough. Cover and let stand for 15 min. Preheat the oven on 300°. Grease pizza pan with cooking spray. Roll out the dough to make the crust. Bake for about 10 mins or until it's light brown. Flip it and let it bake the uncooked side. When done spread pizza sauce and your fav. toppings and bake for 10 min. And Enjoy!!!!!!!!

title: 261. CHOCOLATE PIZZA
info:
CHOCOLATE PIZZA

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 lb. white almond bark, divided
2 c. miniature marshmallows
1 c. crisp rice cereal
1 c. peanuts
1 (6 oz.) jar red maraschino cherries, drained and cut in halves
3 Tbsp. green maraschino cherries, drained and cut in fourths
1/3 c. shredded coconut
1 tsp. oil

preparation

Melt chocolate chips with 14 ounces of almond bark in large saucepan over low heat, stirring until smooth. Remove from heat. Stir in marshmallows, cereal and peanuts. Pour onto greased 12-inch pizza pan. Top with cherries. Sprinkle with coconut. Melt remaining 2 ounces almond bark with oil over low heat, stirring until smooth. Drizzle over coconut. Chill until firm, then store at room temperature.

title: 62. PIZZA BURGERS
info:
PIZZA BURGERS

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onions
1 c. pizza sauce
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
8 buns

preparation

Cook ground beef in large skillet until meat is brown. Add onions and cook for 1 more minute. Add pizza sauce and cheese to cooked hamburger. Cook 2 minutes or until hot.

title: 188. HOMEMADE PIZZA

title: 18. COLD PIZZA
info:
COLD PIZZA
(Appetizer)

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/2 bottle chili sauce (Bennett brand other brands change the taste)
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 pkg. each of white and yellow cheese, shredded

preparation

Mix cream cheese, onion, green pepper and spread evenly over bottom of a square dish or small oblong pan (8 x 4 inch). Spread chili sauce as second layer. Sprinkle cheese on top. Serve with large size Fritos. Since this recipe makes only a small amount, I usually double the recipe.

title: 135. BANANA BROWNIE SPLIT PIZZA
info:
BANANA BROWNIE SPLIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. of brownie mix
1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened
2 bananas
1 c. strawberries
1/2 c. nuts
1/4 c. chocolate ice ream topping

preparation

Prepare brownies according to box instructions and bake on parchment paper for 18 minutes. Then spread pineapple, sugar and cream cheese on cooled brownie. Top with everything else.

title: 111. VEGETABLE PIZZA II
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA II

ingredients

2 pkg. crescent dinner rolls
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix
1 pkg. frozen vegetables, diced
1 pkg. Cheddar cheese, shredded

preparation

Roll out crescent rolls on a 13 x 9-inch cookie sheet, covering the bottom with the crescent dough. Bake dough at 375° for 5 to 8 minutes.

Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and Ranch dressing together. Spread on cooled crust.

Dice thawed vegetables such as broccoli, cauliflower, frozen peas, olives, mushrooms or any other desired vegetables. Sprinkle over cream cheese layer and top pizza with shredded Cheddar cheese.

title: 210. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 cans crescent rolls
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch (dry mix)
2 c. shredded cheese

preparation

Spread rolls on cookie sheet and bake according to directions, 10 to 12 minutes.

Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and Hidden Valley (dry) dressing. Spread onto baked rolls. Top with choice of vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, cucumbers, etc.) and shredded cheese. Bake in preheated hot oven at 400° just until cheese melts. Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

title: 205. PIZZA BUNS
info:
PIZZA BUNS

ingredients

1 can or jar pizza sauce
1 c. mozzarella cheese, grated
1 c. colby cheese, grated
1 pkg. 8 count hamburger buns
butter
garlic salt
oregano
hamburger, cooked or pepperoni

preparation

Preheat oven to 350°. Split buns and lightly butter each half. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Brown hamburger, well. Drain. Set aside. Spread pizza sauce over each bun half. Sprinkle lightly with oregano. Add hamburger to each bun and top with cheeses. Bake in oven until cheeses are melted. You may add any other ingredients you like on pizza.

title: 147. PANCAKE PIZZA
info:
PANCAKE PIZZA

ingredients

2 cups Bisquick baking mix
2 eggs
1 cup milk
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. pancake syrup
1 cup granola without raisins
1 cup chopped walnuts or pecans
Additional pancake syrup

preparation

Place Bisquick in bowl. Combine the eggs, milk, oil and syrup; add to biscuit mix and mix well. Spread onto greased 14 inch pizza pan; sprinkle with granola and nuts. Bake at 425 degrees for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown. Cut into wedges. Serve with additional syrup. Serves 8.

title: 72. PIZZA CUPS
info:
PIZZA CUPS

ingredients

3/4 lb. hamburger
1 c. tomato paste
1/3 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can (10 oz.) refrigerator biscuits
1/2 to 3/4 c. shredded cheese

preparation

Brown hamburger and onions. Drain. Stir in tomato paste, onion and seasonings. Cook over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Place biscuits in a greased muffin tin, pressing to cover bottom and sides. Spoon about 1/4 cup meat mixture into biscuit-lined cups and sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 400° for 12 minutes or until golden brown. Yields 12 cups.

title: 33. COLD PIZZA
info:
COLD PIZZA

ingredients

2 pkgs. crescent rolls
1-6 oz. cream cheese
2/3 C. mayonnaise
pinch of salt and pepper
pinch of dill weed
2 Tbsp. taco sauce
chopped onion, green pepper, green and ripe olives, tomato, shredded cheese

preparation

Line 10 x 15-inch pan with the crescent rolls, bake according to package directions. Combine cream cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, dill weed and taco sauce. Spread on baked and cooled crescent rolls.

Top with chopped onion, peppers, green and ripe olives, tomato, and shredded cheese.

Refrigerate and serve cold. Can be made and served a day later.

title: 156. APPLE PIZZA
info:
APPLE PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. crescent dinner rolls
3 apples, sliced and peeled
Mozzarella cheese, shredded (about 1/2 pkg. or to personal preference)
cinnamon
brown sugar
1/4 c. butter, melted

preparation

Unwrap rolls and lay flat on a round or square pan. Lay out the apples. Drizzle the melted butter all over the apples and sprinkle cinnamon, brown sugar and Mozzarella cheese. Preheat the oven to 325° and bake for about 25 minutes.

title: 271. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 roll sugar cookie dough
strawberries, sliced
kiwi, sliced
1 can mandarin oranges, drained
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
blueberries
1 small carton Cool Whip
powdered sugar
apricot preserves

preparation

Spread cookie dough onto a pizza pan. Poke holes in dough with a fork. Bake as directed on cookie dough package. Cool completely.

While cookie is cooling, mix Cool Whip and just enough powdered sugar to thicken. Spread mixture on the cooled cookie dough. Arrange fruit; brush with melted apricot preserves to preserve color. Serve chilled.

title: 46. PIZZA SALAD
info:
PIZZA SALAD

ingredients

1 lb. spiral pasta
3/4 c. salad oil
1/2 c. wine vinegar
2-3 bunches gr. onions
2 tsp. oregano
2/3 c. grated Parmesan
2-3 lg. tomatoes, cut up
3/4 lb. cheddar cheese, cubed
1/3 lb. pepperoni cut in pcs.

preparation

Cook pasta and run under cold water. Drain & mix with remaining ingredients.

title: 151. EASY PIZZA DIP
info:
EASY PIZZA DIP

ingredients

1 loaf of French or Italian bread
1 brick of cream cheese
1 1/2 c. shredded or grated Parmesan cheese
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 jar of pizza sauce
1 tsp. Italian spice

preparation

Preheat oven to 350°.

In a small casserole dish, soften cream cheese by working it with a spoon. Add in Italian spice and mix well. Smooth the mixture onto an even layer on the bottom of the casserole dish.

In a mixing bowl, combine Parmesan cheese and Mozzarella cheese and blend together. Add half of cheese mixture on top of the cream cheese layer and spread evenly. Pour pizza sauce on top of cheese layer and spread evenly as next layer. Add remaining cheese mixture and spread evenly as top layer. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

Bread: Slice bread cross-wise into 1/2-inch slices. Brush with garlic butter, or you can use butter spray, and broil in the oven until toasted.

Serve them separately to maintain crispness of toast. Guests can spoon the dip onto the bread and enjoy.

title: 118. ZAHTAR PIZZA
info:
ZAHTAR PIZZA
(Thyme Pizza)

ingredients

1 c. zahtar (thyme)
Basic bread dough or frozen dough
Oil

preparation

Add sufficient oil to zahtar to make a thin paste. Make 4 inch circular patties out of the dough. Cover and let rest 15-20 mins. Spread mixture over dough patties. Bake 470° for 10 mins. This will make 1 dozen 4 inch patties.

title: 138. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 sugar cookie refrigerated dough
1- 8 oz. cream cheese, softened
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 can crushed pineapple, drained
1 pint strawberries, cleaned and thinly sliced
2 kiwis, peeled and thinly sliced
2 ripe bananas, thinly sliced
1 large ripe peach, thinly sliced
2 squares chocolate or while vanilla flavored almond bark, melted in a double boiler

preparation

Press cookie dough around a greased pizza pan. Bake as directed on cookie package, but do not over cook. Take out and let cool slightly. Cream sugar and cream cheese and spread on cookie dough. Layer fruit on top of cream cheese and drizzle with melted chocolate or vanilla almond bark. Refrigerate 15 minutes and then ready to serve.

title: 255. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

1/2 c. margarine
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 tsp. cream of tartar
1 tsp. soda
2 3/4 c. flour

preparation

Mix margarine, shortening, sugar and eggs together well. Add cream of tartar, soda, salt and flour. Press dough onto 2 small pizza pans or a 9 x 13 cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 400°.

Topping:

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese, softened
1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. fruit juice
1 medium can fruit cocktail, reserve juice
Fresh strawberries and kiwi
3 Tbsp. cornstarch, depending on remaining juice

preparation

Beat cream cheese, sugar and fruit juice together. Spread on cooled crust. Arrange fruit on top. Cook remaining fruit juice with cornstarch until thickened. Drizzle glaze over top.

title: 246. PULL APART PIZZA BREAD
info:
PULL APART PIZZA BREAD

ingredients

1 can refrigerated biscuits
1 pkg. dry Italian dressing mix
1 c. shredded mozzarella
Olive Oil non-stick cooking spray

preparation

Place biscuits in a well greased 9 by 9-inch square baking dish. Spray biscuits with olive oil spray. Sprinkle on Italian seasoning. Top with shredded cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 25 minutes. Pull apart to serve.

title: 19. APPETIZER VEGGIE PIZZAS
info:
APPETIZER VEGGIE PIZZAS

ingredients

2 pkg. crescent rolls
1 c. mayonnaise
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix
finely chopped vegetables (carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, peppers) any kind
Cheddar cheese

preparation

Press dough onto cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes. Let cool. Combine cream cheese, mayonnaise and salad dressing mix. Mix thoroughly. Spread over baked dough. Top with vegetables and sprinkle with cheese. Cut into squares.

title: 133. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 1/2 c. oleo, softened
1 c. powdered sugar
3 c. flour
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 c. pineapple or other fruit juice
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3/4 c. sugar
desired fruit: oranges, kiwi, blueberries, strawberries, apples, seedless grapes, pineapple, peaches, bananas, blackberries or raspberries (about 3 c.)

preparation

Beat powdered sugar into oleo. Slowly beat in the flour until well combined. Pat the dough into the bottom of a 12-inch pizza pan. Bake at 325° for 30 minutes or until slightly browned. Cool. (I sometimes take a batch of chocolate chip cookie dough, pat into pan and bake.)

In a small bowl, beat together cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla and lemon juice until creamy. Spread over crust. In a small saucepan combine juice, sugar and cornstarch. Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 1 minute more. Remove from heat and cool slightly. Place desired fruit on top of cream cheese mixture. Spoon glaze over fruit. Refrigerate until well chilled.

title: 123. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

2 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. sugar
1 c. nuts
1 small pkg. peach jello
1 c. sugar
4 heaping Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. water
3 peaches
2 bananas
1 (15 1/2 oz.) pineapple tidbits, drained
1 sugar cookie roll, thawed

preparation

Spread sugar cookie roll on pizza pan and bake 8 to 10 minutes. Cool completely. Mix cream cheese, 1 cup sugar and nuts. Spread on cookie. Combine jello, 1 cup sugar, cornstarch and water in saucepan. Cook until thick. Stir constantly once it starts boiling. Let cool. Combine fruit with jello mixture. Spread on cookie. Refrigerate.

title: 126. CHOCOLATE PIZZA
info:
CHOCOLATE PIZZA

ingredients

12 oz. chocolate chips
1 lb. white almond bark, divided
2 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. Rice Krispies
1 c. cocktail peanuts
plain M&M's
1/3 c. coconut
1 tsp. oil

preparation

Microwave chocolate chips and 14 ounces bark on High for 2 minutes, then stir and microwave for 1 to 2 more minutes until smooth when stirred. Stir in marshmallows, Rice Krispies and peanuts. Pour into greased 12-inch pizza pan. Top with M&M's. Sprinkle with coconut. Microwave remaining bark and oil in 1-cup measure for 1 minute. Stir continuously until smooth. Drizzle over coconut. Refrigerate until firm.

title: 277. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 (10.8 oz.) tube refrigerated biscuit dough
1 lb. breakfast sausage, cooked, crumbled and drained
1 c. frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed and shredded
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
2 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
salt and pepper to taste

preparation

Preheat oven to 375° and grease large cookie pan. Pop out biscuit dough and pat on the pan like a pizza crust. Cover dough with sausage, potatoes and Cheddar cheese. Beat together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Carefully pour over pizza and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until it sets. Serve immediately.

title: 136. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. sugar cookie mix
8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. orange juice
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/8 c. lemon juice
assorted fruit

preparation

Let cookie mix soften; spread on cookie sheet and cook until brown. Cool.

Mix cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla. Spread over cookie. Cut fruit into bite sizes. (Use at least 5 different fruits. Dip bananas in lemon juice to prevent darkening.) Place on cream cheese.

Mix orange juice, 1/2 cup sugar, cornstarch and 1/8 cup lemon juice. Cook until slightly thickened. Cool and pour over fruit. Chill and serve.

title: 182. PIZZA SALAD
info:
PIZZA SALAD

Salad:

ingredients

1 lb. spiral macaroni, cooked and drained
Cherry tomatoes
1 lb. cubed cheddar cheese
1-2 bunches of green onions, chopped
3 oz. sliced pepperoni

preparation

In a large bowl, combine macaroni, tomatoes, cheese, onion and pepperoni.

Dressing:

ingredients

3/4 c. vegetable oil
2/3 c. parmesan cheese, grated
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper

preparation

Combine and pour over salad. Cover and refrigerate for several hours. Top with croutons just before serving, if desired.

title: 52. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 1/2 lb. hamburger
1 (15 oz.) can spaghetti sauce
1 (15 oz.) can pizza sauce
small pepperoni
16 oz. rotini noodles
Mozzarella cheese

preparation

Optional: Green peppers, onion, black olives, green olives, sausage, mushrooms, crushed garlic or whatever you like on pizza.

Brown hamburger; drain. Add all other ingredients. Simmer while you cook the noodles. Mix all together. Put into a 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle cheese over top. Cover with foil. Bake for 25 minutes at 350°.

title: 76. QUICK AND EASY PIZZA
info:
QUICK AND EASY PIZZA

ingredients

2 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. milk
1/3 c. oil
2 c. pizza sauce
1/4 c. water
1 tsp. ground oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. onion
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
1 lb. browned hamburger
shredded cheese

preparation

Mix flour, baking powder and salt. Add milk and oil. Pat dough into bottom on greased pizza pan. Mix pizza sauce, water and seasonings. Spread over dough, then sprinkle on onion, mushrooms (well drained), hamburger and cheese. Bake at 425° for 20 to 25 minutes.

title: 240. REUBEN PIZZA
info:
REUBEN PIZZA

ingredients

1 prebaked Italian bread shell crust (14 oz.)
2/3 c. Thousand Island salad dressing
8 oz. thinly sliced corned beef, cut in strips
1 (14 oz.) can sauerkraut, rinsed and well drained
2 c. shredded Swiss cheese

preparation

Place the crust on a 14-inch pizza pan; spread with salad dressing. Layer with corned beef and sauerkraut. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 400° for 12 to 15 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.

title: 187. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. sausage, browned and drained
1 (8 oz.) crescent rolls
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
4 to 6 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. milk
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper

preparation

Line the bottom of a buttered, large glass casserole dish with the rolls, firmly pressing the perforations to seal. Sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Combine remaining ingredients; beat well and pour over sausage and cheese. Bake at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until set. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut into squares and serve immediately.

title: 24. HOT PIZZA DIP
info:
HOT PIZZA DIP

ingredients

8 oz cream cheese, softened
1/2 tsp oregano, dried
1/2 tsp parsley, dried
1/4 tsp basil, dried
1 c mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 c parmesan cheese, grated
1 c pizza sauce
2 tbsp green bell pepper, chopped
2 oz pepperoni sausage, chopped
2 tbsp black olives, sliced

preparation

Microwave pepperoni for 30 seconds. Drain and blot on paper towels. In a small bowl, mix together cream cheese, oregano, parsley and basil. Spread mixture in the bottom of a 9 inch pie plate. Sprinkle 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese and 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese on top of the cream cheese mixture. Spread the pizza sauce over all. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Top with green pepper, pepperoni and olive slices. Cover and microwave for 5 minutes.

Serve hot.

title: 197. MEXICAN PIZZAS
info:
MEXICAN PIZZAS

ingredients

12 corn tortillas
1 lb. ground sirloin
1 green pepper, sliced in thin strips
1 red pepper, sliced in thin strips
1 (1.25 oz.) packet taco seasoning
2 Tbsp. refried beans (canned)
shredded taco cheese blend

preparation

Preheat oven to 425°. Place 2 baking sheets with corn tortillas overlapping (coat both sides of tortillas with cooking spray) in oven. Bake 7 minutes; flip tortillas over. Rotate pans. Bake until lightly brown, 7 minutes. In large nonstick skillet, brown round sirloin, breaking up clumps. Stir in green and red peppers. Add taco seasoning. Cook 4 minutes. Spread tortillas with refried beans or you could use bean dip. Top each with heaping 1/4 cup meat and 2 tablespoons cheese. Bake 2 minutes to melt cheese.

title: 296. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 cans crescent rolls
8 oz. softened cream cheese
16 oz. sour cream
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dip
favorite chopped veggies
Cheddar cheese
bacon bits

preparation

Press crescent rolls on a 17 x 11 cookie pan. Bake at 375° for 10 minutes. While hot, spread on cream cheese. Next, mix sour cream with Hidden Valley Ranch dip mix. Spread over cream cheese. Top with your favorite veggies. Add Cheddar cheese and bacon bits. Keep chilled.

For veggies, broccoli, onion, green pepper, carrots, fresh mushrooms or any combo you prefer.

title: 191. PIZZA ROLLS
info:
PIZZA ROLLS

ingredients

1 tube pizza crust
1 small jar pizza sauce
1 pkg. pepperoni
12 oz. Mozzarella
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. melted margarine
1/2 c. flour

preparation

Sprinkle flour on waxed paper. Place pizza crust on floured surface in rectangular form. Spread on sauce. Cover with pepperoni, top with Mozzarella and gently roll up from one side to the other. Brush with melted margarine and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 12 minutes.

title: 292. PIZZA APPETIZERS
info:
PIZZA APPETIZERS

ingredients

1 pound pork sausage
1 pound velveeta cheese
3 tablespoons catsup
2 tablespoons oregano
dash of garlic powder

preparation

Brown sausage; drain and add cheese and other ingredients. Let cheese melt and mix well. Let it cool a little and then spread on party rye. Bake 5 minutes at 350°.

title: 94. PIZZA MUFFINS
info:
PIZZA MUFFINS

ingredients

sourdough muffins
1 can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. sugar
pinch of oregano
1 pkg. shredded Mozzarella cheese
green olives, sliced
1 pkg. pepperoni

preparation

Cut muffins in half. Mix tomato paste, sugar and oregano; spread onto muffins. Place pepperoni, olives and cheese on muffins and bake at 375° until golden brown.

Can add or take away any toppings as desired.

title: 110. VEGETABLE PIZZA I
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA I

ingredients

1 container crescent roll dough
1 c. low-fat sour cream
1/2 c. Ranch dressing
Italian seasoning to taste
chopped vegetables of your choice (cauliflower, tomatoes, peppers and onions)

preparation

Pat dough in a round pizza pan. Bake at 350° for 10 minutes. Cool. Add Ranch dressing to sour cream and season to taste with Italian seasoning. Spread on baked crescent rolls. Layer chopped veggies on top of dressing mixture. Chill.

title: 90. PIZZA HOTDISH
info:
PIZZA HOTDISH

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped green pepper, if desired
2 cans condensed tomato soup
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 oz. cooked noodles
sliced fresh or canned mushrooms
1/4 lb. grated cheddar cheese
1/4 C. grated parmesan cheese

preparation

Brown meat, add peppers and sauté, add soup and spices simmer. Cook noodles per package instructions. Grease 9x13 pan. Pour in noodles, cover with meat sauce, then mushrooms and cheeses. Bake covered 35 min. at 350 degrees. Then bake uncovered for 10 min. more. Serves 6.

title: 125. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA

ingredients

1 tube sugar cookie dough
8 oz. cream cheese (do not use reduced or fat-free)
1/2 c. powdered sugar
any assortment fresh or canned fruit
1 c. fruit juice (orange juice is good)
2 Tbsp. cornstarch

preparation

Press sugar cookie dough into a pizza or cookie pan. Bake at 400° for 10 to 15 minutes. Cool crust completely.

Combine cream cheese and powdered sugar. Spread over batter. Arrange fruit on cream cheese. Combine juice and cornstarch and cook until slightly thick. Pour over pizza and refrigerate.

title: 39. STRAWBERRY PIZZA
info:
STRAWBERRY PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

1 1/2 c. self-rising flour
1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine
1 c. chopped nuts
2 Tbsp. sugar

preparation

Mix together and press in a pizza pan. Bake 10 to 15 minutes at 350°. Let cool.

Filling:

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese
2 c. powdered sugar
8 oz. whipped topping

preparation

Cream together powdered sugar and cream cheese. Fold in whipped topping. Spread this over cooked crust.

Glaze:

ingredients

1 pt. mashed strawberries
1/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/3 c. water

preparation

Mix well and cook until thick. (You can add chopped almonds or vanilla extract, if desired.) Cool and spread on the cream cheese mixture. Arrange 1 pint sliced strawberries on top.

title: 206. PIZZA BURGER SANDWICHES
info:
PIZZA BURGER SANDWICHES

ingredients

2 lb. ground beef or 6 (1/3 lb.) patties
12 slices pizza (great use for leftover pizza; plain, pepperoni or sausage work best)

preparation

Grill or fry burgers (use 1/3 pound patties or smaller; larger ones are hard to handle); season them to your personal taste. Do not overcook.

Set out 6 slices of pizza. Place cooked burgers on top of pizza slices. Cover burgers with remaining pizza slices, with topping side of pizza touching the burger. Wrap each pizza sandwich in foil. Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes. Serve as a whole sandwich or quartered on a plate covered in pizza sauce.

title: 183. PIZZA SALAD
info:
PIZZA SALAD

ingredients

1 lb. spiral macaroni, cooked
3 tomatoes, diced
1 lb. shredded cheese
2 bunches green onions
3 oz. pepperoni
3/4 c. vinegar
2/3 c. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. oregano
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper

preparation

Combine last 5 ingredients and pour over first 5.

title: 223. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 lb. sausage
2 c. macaroni, cooked and drained
1 jar Ragu pizza sauce
1 pkg. pepperoni
1 (10 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
mushrooms (optional)

preparation

Brown meat. In casserole dish, layer the following: meat, macaroni, pizza sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Repeat layers, ending with cheese. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: 224. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. refrigerated crescent rolls
1 lb. sausage
1 (8 or 10 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese or Velveeta
3 eggs
1/4 c. milk
salt and pepper to taste

preparation

Brown sausage and drain. Press out crescent rolls in a pizza pan or cookie sheet until bottom is entirely covered. Spread sausage over the uncooked crust and then the shredded cheese. Stir the eggs and milk together, then pour over the crust mixture. Bake in preheated oven at 350° for 20 minutes.

title: 185. PIZZA SAUCE
info:
PIZZA SAUCE

ingredients

1 c. pepperoni, grated
1 can tomato paste
1 can water in paste
1 qt. tomato juice
1 onion, grated
celery or salt
oregano to taste

preparation

Add all ingredients together and cook slowly 2 hours or until thick.

title: 258. CANDY SHOP PIZZA
info:
CANDY SHOP PIZZA

ingredients

1 tube refrigerator sugar cookie dough or chocolate chip cookie dough
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 c. chopped candy bars such as Nestle Crunch bars, Butterfinger, Alpine white, Goobers and Raisinets
1 c. cut up fruit like bananas and strawberries (optional)

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Slice cookie dough and spread out dough into a 12 to 14-inch pizza pan. Bake 20 to 24 minutes or until lightly browned.

Immediately sprinkle 1 cup of semi-sweet chocolate chips morsels over crust; drop peanut butter by spoonfuls onto morsels. Let stand for 5 minutes or until soft and shiny. Gently spread chocolate and peanut butter over the crust. Top with fruit and candy. Cut into wedges. Serve warm. Makes 12 servings.

title: 262. BERRY PATCH BROWNIE PIZZA
info:
BERRY PATCH BROWNIE PIZZA

ingredients

1 (19.8 oz.) pkg. fudge brownie mix
1/3 c. chopped unblanched almonds
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 Tbsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. thawed frozen whipped topping
1 pt. fresh strawberries, divided
1/2 c. fresh raspberries
1/2 c. fresh blueberries
grated peel of 1 lemon
powdered sugar (for garnish)
strawberry fan (for garnish)

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Prepare brownie mix according to package directions. Stir in almonds. Spread batter onto bottom of greased 14-inch pizza pan. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until set. Cool completely.

In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and vanilla; mix until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Chop enough strawberries to measure 1/2 cup. Gently stir into cream cheese mixture. Spread strawberry mixture evenly onto brownies. Slice remaining strawberries. Arrange on brownie. Top with raspberries and blueberries. Sprinkle with peel. Garnish with powdered sugar and strawberry fan, if desired. Yield: 16 servings.

title: 70. GERMAN PIZZA
info:
GERMAN PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. hamburger
1/2 medium onion, chopped
1/2 green pepper, chopped (optional)
1 1/2 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
6 medium potatoes (about 2 1/4 lb.)
3 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. milk
2 c. shredded cheese

preparation

In a 12-inch stove-top skillet or electric skillet over medium heat, brown hamburger with onion, green peppers, 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper. Melt butter. Spread potatoes, (which have been peeled and finely shredded) over butter and sprinkle with remaining salt. Top with meat mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all. Cook, covered, until potatoes are tender, about 30 minutes. Top with cheese; cover and heat until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes. Cut into wedges or squares to serve.

title: 141. APPLE PIZZA
info:
APPLE PIZZA

ingredients

1 tube sugar cookie dough
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/3 c. caramel ice cream topping
2 to 3 apples

preparation

Spread sugar cookie dough on bottom of a 13-inch pizza pan or 9 x 13-inch cake pan. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Mix with a beater cream cheese, brown sugar and caramel ice cream topping; beat until smooth. Spread on COLD crust. Put apples, sliced thin in lemon juice and drain really well. Arrange over caramel; sprinkle with mixed nuts or peanuts or a cinnamon/sugar mixture. Refrigerate for awhile, then cut.

title: 59. BUBBLE PIZZA
info:
BUBBLE PIZZA

ingredients

8 oz. lean ground beef
1 -10.2 oz. can Pillsbury Grand Reduced Fat Biscuits
1 -14 oz. jar pizza sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. garlic
salt to taste
onions, mushrooms, pepperoni (small pieces), optional
1 c. shredded mozzarella cheese

preparation

Heat oven to 400°. Brown beef in a large skillet over medium heat until no longer pink. While meat cooks, open tube of biscuits and cut each biscuit into sixths. Spray a 10 inch deep dish pie plate or 9 inch square baking pan. When beef is done, drain well and return to pan. Stir in pizza sauce, seasonings, and other optional items if desired. Spoon sauce evenly over the top and bake for 12-15 minutes, until biscuits are cooked through and cheese is melted. Remove from oven and allow to set 5 minutes before serving. Makes 4-6 servings.

title: 166. PIZZA APPETIZERS
info:
PIZZA APPETIZERS

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. pork sausage
1 lb. Velveeta cheese, cut in cubes
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 loaves party rye bread

preparation

Brown beef and sausage; drain fat and stir in cubed cheese. Add remaining ingredients, except bread; spread on bread. Put in single layer on cookie sheets and freeze. Microwave when you are ready to eat.

title: 287. PEPPERONI PIZZA SPREAD
info:
PEPPERONI PIZZA SPREAD

ingredients

2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 (6 oz.) can ripe olives, drained and chopped
crackers, breadsticks and/or French bread
1 c. mayonnaise
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained and chopped
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 c. chopped stuffed olives

preparation

In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except crackers. Transfer to an 11 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until edges are bubbly and lightly browned. Serve with crackers, breadsticks and/or French bread. Yield: 6 cups.

title: 192. UPSIDE-DOWN PIZZA
info:
UPSIDE-DOWN PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 jar (14 oz.) spaghetti sauce
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 c. milk
2 eggs
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt

preparation

In a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink; drain. Add spaghetti sauce. Cover and simmer until heated through. Pour into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese.

In a blender, combine the milk, eggs, oil, flour and salt; cover and process until smooth. Pour over cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 12 servings.

title: 66. EASY MEXICAN PIZZAS
info:
EASY MEXICAN PIZZAS

ingredients

1 pkg. 10 super size flour tortillas
2 c. Mexican blend shredded cheese, divided
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless boneless chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1 (1.25 oz.) pkg. Ortega taco seasoning mix, divided
1 (1 lb.) can refried beans
Ortega thick taco sauce

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Place 5 tortillas on greased baking sheets. Sprinkle each with 1/4 cup cheese. Place remaining tortillas on top of cheese. Heat vegetable oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken, onions and green peppers. Cook 4 to 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. Add 2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix and 1 tablespoon water; mix well. Remove from heat. Combine refried beans, remaining seasoning mix and 1 tablespoon of water in small bowl. Heat in microwave until warm. Spread about 1/4 cup bean mixture on each tortilla. Layer with a drizzle of taco sauce, chicken mixture, remaining cheese and toppings. Bake for 5 to 8 minutes or until cheese is melted.

title: 25. PIZZA ROLL
info:
PIZZA ROLL

ingredients

1 lb roll hot sausage
Hot roll mix
1 pkg pepperoni
1 lb mozzarella cheese

preparation

Brown sausage with a little onion and green pepper. Mix hot roll mix according to package directions. Cover and let rise in warm place while you slice pepperoni and grate cheese. Roll out dough on floured surface about as large as a cookie sheet. Spread sausage. Cut pepperoni and cheese almost to the ends. Roll up like a jelly roll. Secure ends and place seam side down on cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 20-25 minutes.

title: 36. KIM'S VEGGIE PIZZA
info:
KIM'S VEGGIE PIZZA

ingredients

2 rolls refrigerator crescent rolls
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (whipped OK)
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix
3/4 c. mayonnaise
2 c. finely chopped vegetables (carrots, red and green pepper, radishes, green onion, etc.)

preparation

Spread dough on cookie sheet, pinching edges together. Bake 8 minutes until lightly browned. Cool.

Mix cream cheese, dressing mix and mayonnaise. Spread on cooled crust. Top with finely chopped vegetables. Refrigerate. Cut into small squares to serve as an appetizer or party fare.

title: 207. SHRIMP, SPINACH AND BASIL PIZZA BIANCA
info:
SHRIMP, SPINACH AND BASIL PIZZA BIANCA

ingredients

1 (16 oz.) cheese flavored Boboli crust
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. salt and pepper
1 lb. small cleaned shrimp
2 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
3 c. chopped spinach
1/2 c. grated, part skim Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Provolone cheese
1/2 tsp. basil and oregano

preparation

Place crust on sprayed cookie sheet. Combine cornstarch, milk and garlic in a small pan. Whisk, bringing to a boil. Cook 1 minute; add salt and pepper. Spread on crust. Heat a nonstick skillet coated with Pam over medium heat. Sauté shrimp three minutes. Add mushrooms. Sauté 2 minutes. Stir in spinach and cook until spinach wilts. Drain. Spoon mixture over sauce. Sprinkle with oregano and basil. Top with cheeses. Bake at 425° for 8 minutes or until cheese melts.

title: 280. HOT PIZZA DIP
info:
HOT PIZZA DIP

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
3/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 (8 oz.) can pizza sauce
2 Tbsp. pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. onions, diced

preparation

Combine cream cheese and Italian seasonings; spread into 8-inch pie pan. In a small bowl, combine Mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Sprinkle 1/2 on top of the cream cheese. Spread pizza sauce over the cheese mixture. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Top with bell pepper and green onion. Bake at 350° for 15 to 18 minutes. Serve with French bread or vegetable dippers.

title: 104. PIZZA MACARONI
info:
PIZZA MACARONI

ingredients

16 oz. elbow macaroni
2 (16 oz.) jars pizza sauce
2 c. Cheddar cheese
2 c. Mozzarella cheese
3/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. butter
salt to taste

preparation

Cook macaroni according to package directions. Saut onion and bell pepper in butter. Brown ground beef and add onion, bell pepper and pizza sauce. Mix with cooked macaroni. Put 1/2 macaroni in Pyrex dish. Add 1/2 cheese. Add remaining macaroni and top with remaining cheese. Bake 25 minutes in 350° oven, until cheeses are melted.

title: 239. PIZZA
info:
PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. dry yeast
1 c. warm water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. oil
2 1/2 c. flour

preparation

Mix yeast and water. Add salt, sugar and oil. Mix in flour. Work dough about 5 minutes. Let rest 10 minutes. Spread on pizza pans greased with Crisco. Let rise 1/2 hour. Spread sauce and toppings. Bake at 400° for 15 minutes. Remove from oven. Add cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer.

title: 63. PIZZA STEAK SUB
info:
PIZZA STEAK SUB

ingredients

chipped steak (depends on servings wanted)
1 large onion
2 medium green peppers
1 small can sliced mushrooms
1 (8 oz.) jar pizza sauce
garlic salt to taste
Provolone cheese
8-inch hoagie rolls

preparation

Brown steak. In another pan, brown onions, peppers and mushrooms. Drain steak if necessary. Add onions, peppers, mushrooms, pizza sauce and garlic salt to taste. Simmer 10 minutes on low. Put steak mixture on hoagie roll. Top with cheese. Quick and easy. Tastes great.

title: 203. PIZZA CUPS
info:
PIZZA CUPS

ingredients

1 10 oz. can refrigerated biscuits
15 oz. pizza sauce
8 oz. shredded mozzarella cheese
1 lb. hamburger

preparation

Heat oven to 400°. Grease 10 muffin cups. Brown hamburger, drain. Stir in pizza sauce and 4 ounces of the cheese. Separate dough into 10 biscuits. Place 1 biscuit in each muffin cup. Firmly press in bottom and up sides. Spoon about 1/4 hamburger mixture into each biscuit lined cup. Sprinkle each with cheese. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. or until edges of biscuits are brown.

title: 202. PIZZA HOT DISH
info:
PIZZA HOT DISH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. macaroni (before cooking), cooked
2 lb. hamburger, browned
1/2 c. chopped onion, browned
1 pkg. sliced pepperoni
1 large jar spaghetti sauce
1 can pizza sauce
1 can mushrooms, drained
black olives. chopped (optional)

preparation

Mix together. Top with 8 oz. shredded mozzarella cheese. Bake in a 9 X 13 pan, covered at 350° for 30 minutes.

title: 53. BEEFY HASH BROWN PIZZA
info:
BEEFY HASH BROWN PIZZA

ingredients

5 c. frozen shredded hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can Cheddar cheese soup (undiluted)
1 egg, lightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
1 can pizza sauce
4 c. (16 oz.) shredded pizza cheese, divided

preparation

In a bowl, combine the potatoes, soup, egg, salt and pepper. Spread mixture into a greased 15 x 10-inch baking pan. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until lightly browned.

Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, cook the beef, onion and mushrooms until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in pizza sauce; keep warm. Sprinkle 2 cups cheese over warm crust. Spread meat mixture over the top; sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.

This is a different but good and tasty meal and it really doesn't take long to make.

title: 234. GUATEMALAN PIZZA
info:
GUATEMALAN PIZZA

ingredients

1 - 8 oz. box corn muffin mix
1/4 cup all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 egg
3 Tbsp. milk
1 - 16 oz. can refried beans
1 - 15 oz. can chili without beans
2 cups shredded Monterey jack cheese, or cheddar
optional toppings, sliced olives, chopped onions, peppers, corn or cilantro

preparation

Preheat oven to 400 F. Grease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan. Mix muffin mix, flour, and chili powder. Beat in egg and milk. Pat into pan with hands. Spread refried beans, then chili aver the crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, the cheese should be melted and the crust firm. Remove from heat and allow to cool 10 minutes. Cover with optional toppings if desired. Cut into squares. Makes 12 pieces.

title: 100. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. pork sausage
8 (1 pkg.) crescent rolls
1 c. spicy French fries (frozen), chopped
1 1/2 c. cheese, shredded*
6 to 7 eggs
1/2 c. milk
salt (to taste)
pepper (to taste)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese, shredded

preparation

*Cheddar/Swiss/Monterey Jack (use alone or in combination).

Brown sausage. Drain off fat. Press crescent roll triangles (points toward center) into a 15-inch pizza pan (deep dish works best). Spoon sausage over this crust, then spread with potatoes and cheese. Beat eggs and milk together. Pour over pizza. Sprinkle top with salt, pepper and Parmesan cheese.

Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes.

title: 29. SMOKED SALMON PIZZA
info:
SMOKED SALMON PIZZA

ingredients

1 (16-oz.) baked Italian bread shell
1 pkg. (4 oz.) cream cheese, softened
1/2 red onion, chopped
1/4 hot house cucumber, thinly sliced
1 pkg. (4-oz.) smoked salmon, cut crosswise into thin strips
1/4 c. fresh dill, cut into small sprigs
2 Tbsp. capers, rinsed and drained

preparation

Bake bread shell as package directs. Spread with cream cheese. Top with onions, cucumbers, smoked salmon, dill and capers. Slice or cut into small squares and serve.

title: 57. BUBBLE-UP PIZZA
info:
BUBBLE-UP PIZZA

ingredients

3 pkg. buttermilk biscuits
1 jar spaghetti sauce, divided
3 c. shredded Mozzarella, divided
1 large garlic clove

preparation

Preheat oven to 350°. In batter bowl, quarter biscuits with knife. Stir in 1 cup sauce and 2 cups of cheese. Spread mixture into 9 x 13-inch pan. Pour remaining sauce and cheese over the top. Bake 30 to 35 minutes.

title: 37. BISCUIT PIZZA SNACKS
info:
BISCUIT PIZZA SNACKS

ingredients

1 can Hungry Jack layered biscuits
1 jar Pizza Quick
shredded Mozzarella cheese

preparation

Preheat oven to 400°. Separate biscuits. Put on greased pan. (Can of 5 will be 10 little pizzas.) Cook biscuits at 400° for 3 minutes. Take out and flip over. Add a teaspoon of Pizza Quick to each and sprinkle with cheese. Broil until cheese bubbles.

title: 283. PIZZA SWIRLS
info:
PIZZA SWIRLS

ingredients

1 loaf (1 lb.) frozen bread dough, thawed
1/2 c. prepared pasta sauce
1/2 c. shredded mozzarella cheese
2 T. finely chopped pepperoni
1 T. olive oil
2 T. grated Parmesan

preparation

Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Generously coat a rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray.

Roll out dough to a 10-inch square on a floured surface. Spread pasta sauce over dough. Reserve 2 tablespoons mozzarella; sprinkle remaining mozzarella over sauce. Top with pepperoni. Roll dough jelly-roll style to enclose filling.

Cut roll crosswise into 10 slices. Place slices, cut side down, on prepared baking sheet; brush tops with oil. Sprinkle with Parmesan and remaining mozzarella.

Bake until golden brown, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately.

title: 109. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

2 pounds ground chuck
1 onion
1 green pepper
1 quart ragu sauce
1 can cream of mushroom soup
12 ounce bag of wide egg noodles
3 cups mozzarella cheese, shredded
13 cups cheddar cheese, shredded
sliced pepperoni

preparation

Brown meat with onions and peppers. Drain. Add ragu and cream of mushroom soup. Cook egg noodles for 4 minutes in boiling water, drain. Add cooked noodles to beef mixture. Place beef and noodle mix in a deep 9 by 13 inch pan. Cover with mozzarella and cheddar. Top with pepperoni. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees.

title: 106. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

2 1/2 lb. ground beef, browned & drained
7 oz. bag egg noodles, cooked & drained
2 cans cheddar cheese soup
2 (14 oz) jars Ragu pizza sauce
Mozzarella cheese
Pepperoni slices

preparation

Mix soup and ground beef, stir well. Add Pizza sauce and noodles. Pour into a large casserole dish, top with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni slices. Cover loosely with foil and bake 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove foil and bake 10 minutes longer. Makes a very large casserole. Will freeze well.

title: 32. PIZZA DIP
info:
PIZZA DIP

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) pkg. light cream cheese, softened
1/2 c. light sour cream
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
3/4 c. pizza sauce
1/2 c. chopped pepperoni
1/4 c. chopped green onions
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
tortilla chips

preparation

Beat first 5 ingredients at medium speed with an electric mixer until well blended. Spread in a lightly greased 9-inch pie plate. Spoon pizza sauce evenly over top. Sprinkle with chopped pepperoni and top with chopped green onions.

Bake at 350° for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese and bake 10 more minutes or until cheese melts. Serve with tortilla chips. Yield: 4 servings.

Prep: 15 minutes. Bake: 20 minutes.

title: 107. GARLIC CHICKEN PIZZA
info:
GARLIC CHICKEN PIZZA

ingredients

1 large Boboli bread pizza crust (thin or pan style)
olive oil
2 or 3 chicken breasts
fresh mushrooms
1 bag Sicilian shredded cheese
fresh garlic or Polaner real chopped garlic
onions
garlic salt
oregano

preparation

Generously spread olive oil over top of Boboli bread and bake at 350° for 10 minutes. Spread fresh garlic from garlic press or Polaner chopped garlic on olive oil. Precook chicken breasts and cut into bite-sized pieces. Spread over crust. Top with mushrooms, onions, cheese, garlic salt and oregano. Bake at 350° for about 1/2 hour.

Can substitute Louis Rich Carving Board chicken strips for the chicken breast.

title: 80. PIZZA CASSEROLE I
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE I

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 1/2 c. milk
1 (14 oz.) jar Pizza Quick sauce (Ragu)
3/4 c. biscuit mix
2 eggs

preparation

Brown meat; drain. Put in bottom of 9 x 13-inch casserole dish. Pour pizza sauce over meat. Top with cheese. Add biscuit mix, milk and eggs. Pour over meat and cheese; cover. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes.

title: 55. KIM'S CHICKEN ALFREDO PIZZA
info:
KIM'S CHICKEN ALFREDO PIZZA

ingredients

1 c. Ragu light alfredo sauce
1/2 c. green pepper
chopped onion
2 jalapenos, finely chopped
garlic salt
pepper (coarse)
jerk spice or any spice you prefer
dried parsley flakes
2 chicken breasts, cooked
Mozzarella cheese
pizza crust
cornmeal

preparation

Make pizza crust according to directions. If you use a pizza stone, sprinkle with cornmeal before rolling out crust. Cover crust with sauce and all ingredients, ending with cheese. Bake at 450° for 15 minutes.

title: 98. SAUSAGE AND EGG BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
SAUSAGE AND EGG BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. sausage
1 can refrigerated crescent rolls
1 c. frozen hash brown potato cubes, thawed
1 c. shredded sharp cheddar cheese
3 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
3 Tbsp. each red and green pepper, optional
1/4 c. thinly sliced green onion, optional
2 Tbsp. grated parmesan cheese

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Brown sausage in skillet until no longer pink. Separate rolls into eight triangles. Place in ungreased 12 inch rimmed pizza pan with points toward the center. Press together; seal perforations and form a circle one inch larger in diameter than pan bottom. Turn edges under to make a slight rim. Sprinkle cooked sausage over crust. Top with potatoes; add peppers and green onion, if desired. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir eggs, milk, salt and pepper in a small bowl; pour evenly over pizza. Sprinkle with parmesan. Bake 20 minutes or until eggs are set and crust is golden.

title: 97. PIZZA CARBONARA
info:
PIZZA CARBONARA

ingredients

1 (10 oz.) tube refrigerated pizza crust
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1 c. milk
1/4 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 lb. sliced bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Monterey Jack cheese
3 green onions, thinly sliced

preparation

Unroll pizza crust. Press onto a greased 12-inch pizza pan. Build up edges slightly. Prick dough thoroughly with a fork. Bake at 425° for 7 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned.

Meanwhile, in a saucepan, sauté onion and garlic in butter until tender. Stir in flour and pepper until blended. Gradually add milk and bouillon. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat. Stir in Parmesan cheese. Spread over hot crust. Sprinkle with bacon, Monterey Jack cheese and green onions. Bake at 425° for 8 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted. Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting. Yield: 4 to 6 servings.

title: 121. PEANUT BUTTER BROWNIE PIZZA
info:
PEANUT BUTTER BROWNIE PIZZA

ingredients

1 box brownie mix (13 x 9 pan size)
1 c. brown sugar
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/4 c. peanut butter
3 large Reese's peanut butter cups
2 bananas
chocolate syrup

preparation

Prepare brownies as directed and bake. Allow to cool completely.

While brownies are cooling, beat together brown sugar, cream cheese and peanut butter until smooth. Spread over cooled brownies. Chop bananas and peanut butter cups. Sprinkle over cream cheese mixture. Drizzle with chocolate syrup. Cut into squares to serve.

title: 102. BARBECUE CHICKEN PIZZA
info:
BARBECUE CHICKEN PIZZA

ingredients

1 Boboli Italian Pizza crust, 12 inch
1 6 oz. pkg. Louis Rich Grilled Chicken Breast Strips
1/3 c. Kraft Original Barbecue Sauce
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 small red onion, thinly sliced
1 8 oz. pkg. Kraft Natural Shredded Mozzarella and Cheddar Pizza Cheese

preparation

Place pizza crust on ungreased cookie sheet. Toss chicken with barbecue sauce; place evenly on crust. Top with peppers, onion and cheese. Bake at 450 degrees on bottom oven rack for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted and pizza crust is golden brown. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

Tip: For a crispier crust, bake pizza directly on oven rack.

title: 233. MARY LEES  BUBBLY PIZZA
info:
MARY LEES BUBBLY PIZZA

ingredients

1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 can (15 oz.) pizza sauce
2 tubes/cans refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
1 1/2 c. or 6 oz. shredded mozzarella cheese
1 c. or 4 oz shredded cheddar cheese

preparation

In skillet brown beef and drain. Stir in pizza sauce. Quarter biscuits and place in a greased 13 X 9 X 2 baking dish. Top with beef mixture. Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake another 5 to 10 minutes or until cheese has melted. Let stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.

title: 84. UPSIDE-DOWN PIZZA
info:
UPSIDE-DOWN PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. bulk Italian sausage
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. plus 1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. fennel seed, crushed
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, grated (optional)

preparation

In a saucepan, cook sausage, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in 2 tablespoons of flour, basil and fennel. Mix well. Add tomato sauce. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Transfer to an ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese. Place the remaining flour in a mixing bowl. Beat in the eggs, milk, oil and salt until smooth. Stir in Parmesan cheese, if desired. Pour over casserole. Bake, uncovered, at 425° for 25 to 30 minutes or until browned. Serves 8.

title: 130. STRAWBERRY PIZZA
info:
STRAWBERRY PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

1 1/2 c. self-rising flour
1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine
1 c. chopped nuts
2 Tbsp. sugar

preparation

Mix together and press into pizza pan. Bake in 350° oven for 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool.

Filling:

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese
2 c. powdered sugar
8 oz. Cool Whip

preparation

Cream together cream cheese and powdered sugar. Fold in Cool Whip. Spread this mixture over cooled pie crust.

Glaze:

ingredients

1 pt. mashed strawberries
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/3 c. water

preparation

Mix well and cook until thick. Add almond or vanilla extract, if desired. Cool this mixture and spread over cream cheese mixture.

Arrange 1 pint of strawberries on top of pizza for presentation.

title: 42. PIZZA SNACKS
info:
PIZZA SNACKS

ingredients

1 loaf cocktail rye
1/3 c. bacon bits (Bacos)
1 c. fat-free mayonnaise
1/2 c. sliced green olives with pimentos
1 c. shredded part-skim Mozzarella
3 Tbsp. chopped dried onion

preparation

Mix all ingredients (except bread). Spread on bread. Place on cookie sheets and bake at 400° until cheese browns, about 5 to 8 minutes.
