title: 51. PIZZA HOT DISH
info:
PIZZA HOT DISH

ingredients

2 lb. hamburger
1 onion, chopped
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
15 1/2 oz. jar Ragu spaghetti sauce
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. oregano
8 oz. Cheddar cheese soup
Mozzarella cheese
mushrooms
8 oz. noodles

preparation

Brown the hamburger with the onion. Add the garlic salt, salt and pepper. Drain. Add sauces and oregano. In kettle, cook noodles according to package directions; drain. Then mix in soup. Layer in casserole 1/2 the noodles, 1/2 the meat, remaining noodles and rest of the meat. Cover and bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Remove cover; sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese and bake until cheese melts.

title: 44. SALAD PIZZA
info:
SALAD PIZZA

Crust:

ingredients

1/2 c. butter
1 c. flour
4 eggs

preparation

Mix 1 cup water with butter in saucepan and bring to a boil. Add flour, all at once, and stir rapidly until mixture forms a ball. Remove from heat and cool. Beat in eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each one. Spread in ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes. Cool.

Topping:

ingredients

4 c. chopped or sliced mixed vegetables (lettuce, onions, broccoli, cauliflower, radishes, carrots, peppers, celery, cucumbers and tomatoes)
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1 1/2 c. sour cream or mayonnaise
1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix
2 c. shredded cheese

preparation

Mix cream cheese, sour cream or mayonnaise and dressing mix together well. Spread on top of cooled crust. Top with mixed vegetables and sprinkle cheese on top of all. May sprinkle crumbled bacon on top of cheese or cream cheese, sour cream mixture.

title: 173. PIZZA TREATS
info:
PIZZA TREATS

ingredients

2 lbs. ground beef
1 lb cheddar cheese - grated
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp salt
2 cans tomato sauce
4 small green onions chopped
3 Tbsp oil

preparation

Brown ground beef and drain. In bowl mix all other ingredients. Mix in ground beef and put by spoons full on party rye bread and freeze until ready for use.

title: 231. QUICK AND EASY PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
QUICK AND EASY PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 box fettucine noodles, (cooked and drained)
1 jar spaghetti sauce
1 pkg. sliced pepperoni
1 can sliced mushrooms
Parmesan cheese (as desired)

preparation

Mix all ingredients together. Place into a baking dish with cover. Top with Mozzarella cheese and bake 20 minutes at moderate heat. Serve hot.

title: 49. FIFTH SUNDAY BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
FIFTH SUNDAY BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

2 (10 each) cans flaky biscuits
6 eggs
2 c. shredded cheese (Cheddar or 4 cheese blend)
1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
8 oz. cream cheese

preparation

Divide flaky biscuits into 2 layers each. Begin in the middle of a large pizza pan. Place biscuit layers close together to fill pan. Pat gaps together. Set aside. In mixing bowl, beat eggs with softened cream cheese. Spoon egg mixture over biscuit crust. Sprinkle cheese over entire pizza. Top with crumbled bacon. Bake at 400° for 10 to 15 minutes, until edge is lightly browned and center is set. Cut into wedges or squares. Serves 8 as main dish, 12 as appetizer.

title: 274. EASY PIZZA BROWNIES
info:
EASY PIZZA BROWNIES

ingredients

3/4 c. (1 1/2 sticks) butter or margarine, melted
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
3 eggs
1/2 c. Hershey's cocoa
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt

preparation

Heat oven to 350°. Grease 12-inch pizza pan or 13 x 9-inch baking pan. If using a disposable pizza pan, place on cookie sheet to bake. Use only a spoon to beat melted butter, sugar, vanilla and eggs in large bowl. Stir in dry ingredients until well blended. Spread into pan. Bake 20 to 22 minutes or until top springs back when touched lightly. Serve plain or sprinkle hot brownie with chocolate or white chips, peanut butter chips, coconut or toffee bits.

title: 209. GREEK PIZZA
info:
GREEK PIZZA

ingredients

1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. chopped onion
3 cloves garlic, minced
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1/2 c. chopped fresh basil
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh oregano
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. ground black pepper
20 sheets Athenos fillo dough
1/2 c. butter, melted
4 c. (1 lb.) grated Mozzarella cheese
3 medium tomatoes, sliced thin
2 c. crumbled Feta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs

preparation

In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic. Saut for 5 minutes. Add spinach and saut until all excess moisture has evaporated. Add basil, oregano, lemon juice and pepper. Mix well. Cool. Place length of fillo across width of buttered 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking dish. Use 10 sheets of fillo dough, brushing every two with melted butter or margarine. Overlap each set of fillo sheets at the center. At the edges of the baking dish, roll fillo onto itself to form "pizza crust." Brush top layer with melted butter or olive oil. Spread spinach mixture on prepared fillo sheets. Top spinach with 1/2 of the Mozzarella. Dredge tomatoes in bread crumbs and arrange on top of Mozzarella. Top with remaining Mozzarella and Feta cheese. Bake in preheated oven at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown.

title: 170. PIZZA DIP
info:
PIZZA DIP

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. pizza sauce
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped pepperoni
1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese

preparation

Mix the cream cheese, sour cream, oregano and crushed red pepper. Spread in bottom of pan. Cover with pizza sauce. Sprinkle onion, green pepper and pepperoni on top. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes. Top with Mozzarella and return to oven. Remove when cheese has melted. Serve hot with crackers, bread sticks or garlic bread.

title: 227. POPOVER PIZZA
info:
POPOVER PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. ground beef
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 envelope spaghetti sauce mix
1/2 c. water

preparation

Brown beef. Add sauce mix, tomato sauce and water. Simmer 10 minutes. Spoon into greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Top with cheese. Put in 400° oven to keep warm.

Popover Batter:

ingredients

2 large eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. oil
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese

preparation

Beat eggs, milk and oil. Add flour and salt and beat until smooth. Pour over pizza filling. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes.

title: 221. PIZZA MACARONI BAKE
info:
PIZZA MACARONI BAKE

ingredients

1 pkg. (7 3/4 oz.) macaroni and cheese dinner
6 c. water
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 c. shredded cheddar cheese
1 jar (14 oz.) pizza sauce
1 pkg. (3 1/2 oz.) sliced pepperoni
1 c. shredded mozzarella cheese

preparation

Set the cheese packet from dinner mix aside. In a saucepan, bring water to boil. Add macaroni; cook for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook the beef, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Drain macaroni; stir in the contents of cheese packet. Transfer to a greased 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Top with beef mixture, pizza sauce and pepperoni and mozzarella cheese. Bake uncovered at 350° for 20-25 minutes or until heated through.

title: 159. COOL SHRIMP PIZZA
info:
COOL SHRIMP PIZZA

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) pkg. refrigerated crescent rolls
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/4 c. dairy sour cream
1 1/2 tsp. snipped fresh dill or 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 c. bottled cocktail sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen peeled cooked shrimp, thawed
1/2 c. chopped green sweet pepper
1/3 c. chopped onion
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (4 oz.)

preparation

Preheat oven to 375°. Unroll dough and pat dough evenly onto 12-inch greased pizza pan, sealing perforations. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes or until crust is light golden brown. Remove pan from oven. Cool completely on a wire rack.

Meanwhile in a small bowl, stir together cream cheese, sour cream and dill. Spread cream cheese mixture on top of cooled crust. Spread the cocktail sauce evenly over cream cheese mixture. Top with shrimp, green pepper, onion and cheese. Cover and chill 2 to 24 hours.

title: 168. STRAWBERRY PIZZA
info:
STRAWBERRY PIZZA

Bottom:

ingredients

1 c. flour
1 stick melted butter
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. chopped nuts (pecans)

preparation

Mix together and put in bottom of pan. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes. Let cool.

Second Layer:

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese
1/2 c. powdered sugar
8 oz. Cool Whip

preparation

Mix together and spread on crust.

Top (Red Filling):

ingredients

1 c. sugar
1 c. cold water
3 Tbsp. strawberry jello
3 Tbsp. cornstarch

preparation

Mix and cook until thick. Once mixture cools, add strawberries.

title: 124. FRUIT PIZZA
info:
FRUIT PIZZA
(The Best)

Crust:

ingredients

3/4 c. butter
1/2 c. powdered sugar
1 1/2 c. flour

preparation

Mix ingredients until crumbly. Pat into 12-inch round pizza pan. Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes. Cool.

Filling:

ingredients

8 oz. cream cheese
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla or almond flavoring
1 c. water or liquid from canned fruit
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. lemon juice

preparation

Mix in saucepan. Stir over medium heat until it thickens and cool before spooning over fruit. Make sure to cover each piece of fruit with the sauce. Refrigerate and serve as pie slices.

title: 26. VEGETABLE PIZZA
info:
VEGETABLE PIZZA

ingredients

2 pkg Crescent rolls
2 8 oz. pkg Cream Cheese
1 cup Mayonnaise
1 tsp Dill Weed
1 tsp Onion Salt
Chopped: Broccoli, Celery, Onion, Tomato, Cauliflower, Red/Green Peppers, Green/Black Olives

preparation

Pat Crescent rolls in greased jelly roll pan, bake at 350 degrees until lightly browned. Mix together Cream cheese, Mayonnaise, Dill Weed and Onion Salt and spread onto cooled crust. Cover with Chopped vegetables and cut into small squares.

title: 144. PIZZA GRILLED CHEESE
info:
PIZZA GRILLED CHEESE

ingredients

1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened
2 slices bread
1 slice Provolone or Mozzarella cheese
6 slices pepperoni
3 Tbsp. pizza sauce

preparation

Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place one slice in skillet, butter side down. Top with the cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce and second bread slice, butter side up. Cook over medium heat until golden brown, turning once. Serve with additional pizza sauce if desired. YIELD: 1 serving.

title: 164. ANNIE'S PIZZA BITES
info:
ANNIE'S PIZZA BITES

ingredients

2 pkgs. refrigerated pizza crust dough
4 oz. pizza sauce
1/2 c. chopped pepperoni
1 c. shredded pizza blend cheese

preparation

On a 9 by 13-inch cookie sheet, roll out 1 can pizza dough to edges of cookie sheet. Spread pizza sauce evenly over crust leaving 1/2-inch space around the edges of the crust. Sprinkle pepperoni and cheese evenly over sauce. Roll out remaining can of dough into a 9 by 13-inch rectangle. Carefully place this on top. With a pizza cutter, score into 16 rectangles. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve warm.

title: 212. PIZZA CASSEROLE
info:
PIZZA CASSEROLE

ingredients

1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 pkg. pepperoni
1 large onion
7 oz. elbow macaroni
1 large jar spaghetti sauce
1 can mushrooms (optional)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese (for top)
salt
pepper (I use white pepper)

preparation

Cook macaroni until tender; drain liquid off. Brown ground beef; season with salt, pepper and onions. Drain fat. Mix all other ingredients together, except cheese. Pour into 9 x 13 baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese to edge. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Serve with salad and bread sticks for a complete meal.

title: 297. HOT PIZZA DIP
info:
HOT PIZZA DIP

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 (8 oz.) can pizza sauce
2 Tbsp. green onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. thinly sliced green pepper

preparation

In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and Italian seasoning. Spread in an ungreased 9-inch microwave-safe pie plate. Combine Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses. Sprinkle half over cream cheese. Top with the pizza sauce, remaining cheese mixture, green pepper and onion. Microwave on High for 3 to 4 minutes, uncovered, or until the cheese is almost melted. (Rotate a half turn several times.) Let stand for 1 to 2 minutes. Yields about 3 cups. Serve with tortilla chips or breadsticks.

title: 300. LITTLE PIZZAS
info:
LITTLE PIZZAS

ingredients

1 lb. Italian sausage links
1 c. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. oregano, dried
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
dash of black pepper
2 loaves (8 oz.) sourdough or party rye bread
1 lb. hot bulk sausage
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. fennel seed
1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. box American cheese

preparation

Use heavy-duty large pan. Crumble Italian sausage, after taking casing off sausage, into a skillet. Add bulk sausage. Stir and cook on medium heat until well mixed. Then add all the other ingredients. Turn heat down to low. Cook until all the cheese is melted and all the ingredients are well done. When done, use a tablespoon to cover slices of bread. Place on a cookie sheet and freeze. When frozen, place in freezer bags. Take out of the freezer when ready to bake.

To bake, preheat oven to 400°. Place bread slices on lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake 6 to 8 minutes, until well heated.

title: 256. HALLOWEEN COOKIE PIZZA
info:
HALLOWEEN COOKIE PIZZA

Pizza:

ingredients

3/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/2 c. margarine
1 egg
1 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. peanut butter chips
1 c. mini-marshmallows
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped pecans

preparation

Preheat oven to 350°. Lightly grease a 12 inch pizza pan. In a large mixer bowl, beat sugar and margarine until creamy. Add egg, water and vanilla. Beat well. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, soda and salt. Add to sugar mixture, beating on low until blended. Stir in peanut butter chips. Spread batter in prepared pan to within 1/2 inch of edge. Bake 11 to 13 minutes or until set. Remove from oven. Sprinkle marshmallows, chocolate chips and nuts over top. Return to oven. Bake 5 to 7 minutes or until marshmallows are lightly browned. Cool completely.

Chocolate Drizzle:

ingredients

1/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 or 3 tsp. margarine

preparation

Melt together. Drizzle over top of cooled pizza.

Orange Drizzle:

ingredients

1/2 c. powdered sugar
1 Tbsp. water
3 drops yellow food coloring
2 drops red food coloring

preparation

Blend together and drizzle over chocolate drizzle. Let stand a minute to let drizzles set.

title: 48. BREAKFAST PIZZA
info:
BREAKFAST PIZZA

ingredients

1 can crescent rolls
sausage
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1 c. Cheddar cheese
6 eggs
1/2 c. milk

preparation

Spread rolls on cookie sheet and bake for 5 minutes. Brown sausage and sprinkle on top. Sprinkle cheese on top of sausage. Mix 6 eggs and milk. Pour slowly on top. Bake at 325° for about 30 minutes or until done.

title: 31. MINIATURE PIZZA
info:
MINIATURE PIZZA

ingredients

1 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese
1 small onion, chopped
1 small bell pepper, chopped
8 strips bacon, fried and crumbled

preparation

Mix all ingredients together with a small amount of mayonnaise to make a spread. Spread on party rye or pumpernickel. Cook in 300° oven for approximately 10 minutes or until cheese melts. Serve warm.

title: 218. CHEDDAR APPLE PIZZA
info:
CHEDDAR APPLE PIZZA

ingredients

pastry for single crust pie
4 large tart apples, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices (about 5 c.)
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar, Mozzarella or Swiss cheese
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
2 Tbsp. cold water

preparation

Roll pastry to fit a greased 12-inch pizza pan. Flute edges. Bake at 400° for 10 minutes. Arrange apples in single layer. Sprinkle with cheese. Combine the brown sugar, walnuts, cinnamon and nutmeg. Sprinkle over cheese. Cut butter into small pieces and dot top of pizza. Bake for 20 minutes or until apples are tender. Cut into wedges. Serve warm. Yield: 12 servings.

title: 266. TAFFY APPLE PIZZA
info:
TAFFY APPLE PIZZA

ingredients

1 pkg. refrigerated sugar cookie dough
8 oz. softened light cream cheese
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. reduced fat creamy peanut butter
2 peeled, cored, & sliced Granny Smith apples
1/4 c. caramel ice cream topping
1/2 c. chopped peanuts

preparation

On a well greased 15-inch pizza pan, press out cookie dough into a 14-inch circle. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Combine cream cheese, peanut butter, and sugar. Spread this mixture evenly over cooled cookie. Arrange apple slices over this mixture. Uniformly sprinkle on chopped peanuts and drizzle with caramel topping. Slice and serve with vanilla ice cream or cool whip.
